attributes.action: when the cure is worse than the pandemic on society
attributes.additional_details: I have seen to many friends and family going through serious mental issues with can I leave home can i meet people "well can I,, can I" I today witnessed an old lady dropping shopping and struggling to pick it up,, my wife said can I help I dont to know what to do. I said yes help the woman it was so stressful from 2 people who are alien to not helping but in the current crisis we dont know what to do for the best,,,, Lets cut the crap and say its business as usual and learn to live with this.
attributes.background: I want the government to ask the public do we want to say enough is enough its business as usual on November 1st and we need to learn to live with the virus and get on with life.
